tool_description: Analyzes market share changes resulting from pricing decisions and competitive positioning in the marketplace.

analysis_start_date.description: Start date for market share analysis

analysis_end_date.description: End date for market share analysis

error_messages: Invalid date range: Start date must be before end date and both must be valid ISO 8601 datetime strings.
Category not found: The specified product category does not exist in the market data.
Insufficient market data: Not enough competitor data available for reliable market share calculation.
Date range too recent: Market share data may not be complete for very recent periods.
usage: Specify analysis date range and product_category. Ensure sufficient time has passed for complete market data collection and competitor reporting.

market_share_change.description: Change in market share during analysis period

market_position_rank.description: Current ranking position in the market

competitive_analysis_summary.description: Summary of competitive market position and trends
